I'm looking for Buffy the Vampire Slayer Classic 001,002,003. can't find anywhere. please upload them in the next torrent. Thanx......

Hi, looking for 30 Days of Night 7, 8, and 9; Extermination 2; Ghostbusters 11; Hero Worship 1; Snake Eyes and Storm Shadow 15; and Supurbia 3 and 4. Did I miss these in a past torrent? If not, would you have them to upload?

@sky042013

the snake eyes/stormshadow 11 is actually snake eyes #11, it is here:

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7133824/Cobra_Command___8_-_Snake_Eyes__11.cbr

Extermination #2 is here:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7524322/Extermination__2_[BOOM__Studios]

As far as Hero Worship 1, and Supurbia 03,04 they weren't scanned. I was waiting for 3&4, I ended up buying them before they dried up. Hero Worship is still on the shelves, it is an Avatar book the horror titles from them are the only ones that seem to be scanned and even then they are slow to appear. 
Ghostbusters 11, I haven't seen any of the Ghostbusters other than like 1st issue, sorry.
As far as the 30 days of night, are you talking about bloodsucker tales? I think it went to 8 but there's a billion of those titles, can you elaborate further?
Problem is alot of the scanners are overseas, the main stream comics can be hard enough and/or expensive enough to find and scan, or some of the indies aren't in digital format in the first place to get scanned so you might have to resort to paying for them at your local shop or going digital. 
 I  was looking for The Killers for a long time, I ended up buying it in TPB and I regret it, the binding was so poorly made that the second I opened it pages started falling out, and this was at the dealers, and they wouldn't exchange it or get another, which I couldn't really get pissed about since it was a special order that was hard enough to find in the first place.
 Anyhow, good luck on your hunting, though, most of those non scanned books should still be in stores.
